patterns: What is the Purpose of the project
responses: I am AyurBot. I can help determine your prakriti type. Prakriti is our inherent nature, with which we are born. It is the nature of our body in terms of dosha. It dies not change during the whole lifetime. It is also responsible for the physical and mental characteristics.
You can call me AyurBot.
I'm AyurBot!
Just call me as AyurBot

patterns: Can you recommend a diet for me?
responses: Sure, I can provide personalized diet recommendations based on your Prakriti. Please answer a few questions to get started.
I'd be happy to recommend a diet plan tailored to your Ayurvedic constitution. Let's begin by understanding your Prakriti.
Certainly! I can recommend exercises based on your Prakriti and fitness goals. Let's get started!
I can provide personalized exercise suggestions to help you stay healthy and balanced.
Managing stress is crucial for overall well-being. I can offer tips and techniques to help you relax and unwind.
I can provide stress management strategies, including mindfulness practices, deep breathing exercises, and relaxation techniques.

patterns: How can I improve my sleep?
responses: Improving sleep quality is essential for health. I can suggest tips and practices to promote better sleep hygiene.
I can offer advice on enhancing sleep quality, including establishing a bedtime routine, creating a comfortable sleep environment, and practicing relaxation techniques.

patterns: I want to learn about healthy eating
responses: Nutrition plays a vital role in overall health. I can provide information on balanced diets, essential nutrients, and healthy eating habits.
I can offer insights into nutrition and dietary principles to help you make informed choices for optimal health and wellness.
